name: Super Vadimka X2
description: Super Vadimka X2 (stylized as SUPER VADIMKA X2), known in Russia as Vadim Kulev X2 is a free video game made by two developers VadimBallzGame and HyperTheLoopa420 for Windows. The game was released on April 9, 2023, and in North America in 2023. This is a direct sequel to Super Vadimka X, released in the same year. The action of Super Vadimka X2 takes place in the near future, a new opponent named Chris Chan wants to take over the world and kill the main character Super Vadimka X will the hero be able to survive a second time.
